messages.content:
Hi Athena! Here's the brief for our advertising poster project. Excited to work with you!

üìÅ [Project Brief - Eye Clinics of San Jose](https://drive.google.com/file/d/PRD_eye_clinics)
Thanks Marcus! I love the facility - that awning is going to look great stylized. I'll have roughs for you by end of week.
Here are 4 rough compositions. Which direction speaks to you? A, B1, B2, or C?
Love option C! The three-quarter angle really shows off the building.
Great choice! One more question - do you like the anonymized person on the bench? Adds a human touch.

question.text: Do you like the anonymized person on the bench?

demoFlow: 1. Client clicks YES on bench question
2. Designer uploads v1_no_bench.png ‚Üí ScopeWatcher catches missing bench
4. Client annotates small area ‚Üí IntentLens shows minor change
5. Client types 'different angle' ‚Üí CostCalculator warns about cost

catch1.violation: goal-005 (Include anonymized person sitting on bench)
catch1.action: Show validation card asking designer to fix

catch2.action: Show validation card warning about scope impact
